title: Re-downloading the patch everytime I start the client
body: Hello, as you read above my client re-downloaded the new 7.9 patch after i patched it already yesterday and it complete the repatching but the problem is after some games I closed my client as usual turned off my PC (W8.1) and returned to play again I faced the same problem plz help me!!!

replies.body: What's happening is your client is noticing some damaged files with the latest patch, so it's reverting to try and get a better download of it. Let's grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a force repatch to see if you can get a clean install this time, and if not we may need to dig a little further.
